Docs.summary: Provides a type converter to convert opacity values to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an OpacityConverter. Instead, you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class. For more information about type converters and to view code examples, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
